# [Interview #188: Wotmania Interview, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=188#11)

#### Wotmania

Did Ingtar free Padan Fain in
*The Great Hunt*
? Or was it someone else?

#### Robert Jordan

It was Ingtar. Didn't expect a straight answer, did you?
